fields.description: Once TIMOB-14071 is implemented, Alloy should make use of the "project" hook from the CLI to determine if it needs to add platform-specific resources to the "app/assets" folder. This will ensure that newly added platforms have the necessary files in the "app/assets" folder for each platform.
fields.summary: Use CLI "project" hook to update app/assets platform-specific resources
